Description:
Supervisor will be in charge of a slick line unit and his crew
Supervisor will run jobs, prepare tickets & job reports on a daily basis
Supervisor will maintain his vehicles, unit and tools
Supervisor will maintain good relations with client representatives and stay in contact with them to secure continuous work
Supervisor will strictly follow the HSE rules and programs
Supervisor will train his helpers to run a safe and efficient operation
Perform all type of Slickline services (DHC, SSD, Swabbing, Tubing Checks, Memory gauges survey, etc...) Skills
Skills:
Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Petroleum Engineering or Diploma with minimum 08 years of working experience in Slickline services.
Must have experience in Digital Slickline (DSL).
Slickline Training Certificate is required.
